location.name: Guest House / Inn
location.description: Traditional Korean inn serving as a common meeting place for travelers
location.atmosphere: Busy, tense undercurrent, public space, transient

generation.prompt:
Korean webtoon background illustration:
- Location: Guest House / Inn (객잔)
- Setting: Inn exterior with traditional signage
- View: exterior view

VISUAL ELEMENTS:
Traditional Korean inn architecture, Dining area with low tables, Wooden interior with warm tones, Paper screen doors (hanji), Lantern lighting, Kitchen area visible in background

ATMOSPHERE:
- Mood: Busy, tense undercurrent, public space, transient
- Lighting: Warm oil lamp or candle lighting
- Color Temperature: 2700K (warm)
- Shadow Intensity: High (dramatic)

STYLE REQUIREMENTS:
- Art style: Korean webtoon (manhwa), wuxia genre
- Clean detailed linework, cel-shaded with gradient accents
- Color emphasis: #c9a227, #8b7355, #5a4a3a, #1a1a2e
- High detail environment art, publication ready
- No characters, environment only
- No text or UI elements

COMPOSITION:
- Wide establishing shot
- Depth and atmosphere emphasized
- Appropriate atmospheric effects

QUALITY: High detail, 2K resolution quality, professional illustration
